title: C++ Level 4 â€” Loops & Counting
concept: Use for/while loops to print ranges, compute sums, factorials, and simple numeric properties.

challenges.title: From A to B
challenges.description: Given two integers A and B, print all numbers from A to B inclusive. If A <= B, print in ascending order; otherwise in descending order. All numbers must be on a single line separated by one space.
challenges.outputDescription: Sequence of integers separated by single spaces on one line.

challenges.title: Squares Not Exceeding N
challenges.description: Given an integer N (N >= 1), print all perfect squares (1, 4, 9, ...) that are less than or equal to N. Print them on one line separated by single spaces.
challenges.outputDescription: All squares i*i <= N in ascending order.

challenges.title: Sum of 10 Numbers
challenges.description: Read exactly 10 integers and print their sum.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of the 10 numbers.

challenges.title: Sum of N Numbers
challenges.description: The first input line contains integer N. Then follow N integers. Print their sum.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line (or following): N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of the N integers.

challenges.title: Sum of Cubes
challenges.description: Given integer N (N >= 1), compute 1^3 + 2^3 + ... + N^3 and print the result.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of cubes from 1 to N.

challenges.title: Factorial
challenges.description: Given integer n (n >= 0), compute n! = 1 * 2 * ... * n. Define 0! = 1.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: n! (fits in 64-bit for test data).

challenges.title: Count Zeros
challenges.description: First read integer N. Then read N integers. Count how many of them are equal to zero and print that count.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Next N integers.

challenges.title: Sum of Factorials
challenges.description: Given integer n (n >= 1), compute 1! + 2! + ... + n! and print the sum.

challenges.title: Smallest Divisor
challenges.description: Given an integer n >= 2, find its smallest divisor greater than 1 and print it.
challenges.outputDescription: Smallest integer d > 1 that divides n.

challenges.title: Largest Power of Two
challenges.description: Given integer N >= 1, find the largest integer x such that 2^x <= N. Print x and 2^x separated by a space.
